duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide great customer service including taking orders, assembling orders, delivering food, and cleaning dining room.
Thrive in a fast-paced environment and work shifts including opening, closing, and everything in between.
Provide paid training for new team members and offer opportunities for career growth within the company.
Earn hourly pay increases through additional training, certifications, and performance evaluations.
Exhibit qualities of a great customer service associate such as teamwork, excellent communication, hard work, and responsibility.

education_certification.credential: No specific education or certification required. Entry-level position with paid training.
